author: Russian Bot
comment: I LOVE the color combination on this face. It's reminiscent of the Dials face for the Moto 360, but much more bold. Ambient mode looks clean on the Moto 360 v2, and I love the way the dial tick marks follow the watch's face contour. It has an option to remove the logo, and contrary to previous reviews, it DOES work. I appreciate the second time zone option, but maybe add a digital option for it? Still, this is a great debut!

reply.author: Raffaele Garofalo (Raffaeu)
reply.content: Thank you and I will create an extra panel with a secondary digital clock, great suggestion.

title: Awesome new release!

reply.author: Raffaele Garofalo (Raffaeu)
reply.content: Please double check because is working, probably your watch didn't upgrade yet, that may take some hours depending on the Bluetooth connectivity. So you see the option on your phone but it is not uploaded yet on your watch.
